import React,{useState} from "react"; import NavBar from "./NavBar"; import axios from "axios"; const Signup = () => { const [name, setName] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [OtpSent,setOtpSent] = useState(false) const handleSubmit= async (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); try { // Send a POST request to your backend to send the OTP await axios.post("https://65fd48049fc4425c65319005.mockapi.io/Projects/", { name }); setOtpSent(true); } catch (error) { console.error("Error sending OTP:", error); } } return (

); }; export default Signup;
